snippet: The two-time defending national champion Crimson Tide are the top-ranked team in the Associated Press preseason poll as they try to become the first team to win three straight national titles.
abstract: Alabama will begin 2013 college football season ranked No. 1, as it begins quest to become the first team to win three straight national titles; other college football news noted.
lead_paragraph: The two-time defending national champion Crimson Tide are the top-ranked team in the Associated Press preseason poll as they try to become the first team to win three straight national titles.

headline.main: Alabama Ranked No. 1 in A.P. Poll
headline.print_headline: Alabama Ranked No. 1 in A.P. Poll
